prospects.name: Galicia: Camarinas to Muxia
prospects.description:
It’s time for a wild coastal adventure with your host, Michael Cotty, across some of the stunning undulating roads of Galica, Spain. You’ll start at a historic lighthouse on the ‘Coast of Death’ before working your way deep into the rugged landscape that defines this region. The road will guide your workout, with big efforts up every hill and a chance to take it a bit easier on the descents. It’s not all hard work, though, Mike takes the time to show you around the fishing marina, where to find the ‘hunger herb’ and some of the sights around our finishing village, Muxia.

​

This is a great session for anyone who wants to get in a bit of sprint/anaerobic capacity efforts while laying down some solid aerobic time.

​

[**Route on Strava**](https://www.strava.com/activities/7392408454)

​

_Your Host: There are few people who know the mountains and roads of Europe better than Wahoo Ambassador Michael Cotty. As founder of The Col Collective, Mike has made a career out of riding, filming, and telling the story of epic rides and mountains across the continent. As your On Location co-creator and host, Mike's engaging character, curious mind, and friendly nature will have you cueing up your next ride with him before you've even finished the cool-down._

prospects.name: UAE Tour 1
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Alessandro DEMARCHI of Italy

**Event:** UAE Tour

**Mission - "The Wounded":** An early crash has put a serious dent into your goal of winning the Queen Stage at the UAE Tour. Nevertheless, you've managed to recover and have rejoined the peloton and the GC favorites just at the base of the stage's major climb. Bridging the gap has taken its toll and you'll need to muster all of your strength and courage just to keep going. Can you defy the odds and not just finish with the pack but take the win? Be prepared for a big, long slog up Jebel Jais, the highest point in the UAE.

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. We’ve taken the first-person camera footage and power data from a pro cyclist and analyzed it to determine which part of their 4DP® profile each of their efforts corresponds to. But since few of us can put down pro-level watts, we made it so all of the efforts are scaled to your own personal 4DP® profile. That means you get to experience exactly what the pros experience relative to your own abilities. When they sprint, you sprint. When they attack, you attack. When they sit up, you get to take it (relatively) easy. It's the most immersive, realistic race simulation out there.

​

[Here's some more information on how to create the most immersive ProRides experience.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterProRides)

​

**Featured Footage: **Velon

prospects.name: Tour of Norway 1
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Alexandr RIABUSHENKO of Belarus

**Event:** Tour of Norway

**Mission - "Domestique":** It's the first stage of the Tour of Norway. You've been chosen to help get your team's star sprinter, Alexander Kristoff, in position to take the win. You need to be ready to bury yourself in service of your team. It might not be the most glamorous, but it will earn you the respect and admiration of your teammates. There are stars and there are water carriers: today you're loading up with bottles.

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. That means you get to experience exactly what the pros experience relative to your own abilities. When they sprint, you sprint. When they attack, you attack. When they sit up, you get to take it (relatively) easy. It's the most immersive, realistic race simulation out there.

​

​

**Featured Footage: **Velon

prospects.name: Giro d'Italia Donne 1
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Clara KOPPENBURG of Germany

**Event:** Giro D'Italia Donne

**Mission - "Through the Wringer":** It's Stage 7 of the Women Giro d'Italia. As the Team Leader at Rally Cycling, you're riding to defend a respectable 22nd position in the GC—and perhaps even break the top 10. Today's stage is on a hilly, punchy circuit. You'll need to put in some serious work to stay with the GC leaders if you want a chance of grabbing a top 10 GC result at the end of the Tour.

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. prospects.name: Tour of Norway 2
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Carl Fredrick HAGEN of Norway

**Event: **Tour of Norway

**Mission - "Wonderkid":** Experience the thrill of the breakaway with the peloton breathing down your neck - You're riding for Team Lotto Soudal - You've been in the breakaway all day. There's just one hour of racing left and you're sitting at the top of the virtual GC on the last day of the Tour of Norway, your home tour — Of any day to go all out and empty the tank, today is the day — Take your pulls, lead the breakaway and fight to stay away from the peloton.

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. prospects.name: Strade Bianche 1
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Tosh Van der Sande of Belgium

**Event:** Strade Bianche

**Mission - "The Scout":** Welcome to the famous white roads of Tuscany: dusty, unpredictable, and unbelievably hilly. You got in the early break to take the pressure off your teammates. By giving them a bit of a rest early on they'll have a better chance of making a move as the race winds towards the iconic finish in the picturesque hill town of Sienna. Your job is to make sure everybody in the break works well together to maintain a gap and hold off the peloton for as long as you can. The other teams' star riders are breathing down your neck. How long can you keep them at bay?

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. We’ve taken the first-person camera footage and power data from a pro cyclist and analyzed it to determine which part of their 4DP® profile each of their efforts corresponds to. But since few of us can put down pro-level watts, we made it so all of the efforts are scaled to your own personal 4DP® profile. That means you get to experience exactly what the pros experience relative to your own abilities. When they sprint, you sprint. When they attack, you attack. prospects.name: Hammer Climb 1
prospects.description:
**Featured rider:** Nathan Van Hooydonck

**Event:** Hammer Limburg Climb

**Mission - "You've Been Served":** Experience the madness and fast-paced team racing of the Velon Hammer Series. A Hammer race consist of three disciplines; the Hammer Climb, Sprint and Chase; all of which take place on a short circuit.

​

You're part of the Team CCC, taking part in the first day of racing at the Hammer Series: The Climb. It's a full-gas, two hours of racing where teams collect points on every lap at the top of the climb. Problem is, you're not a climber. You'll have to work and suffer as a team if you want to take top honors going into tomorrow's Sprint stage. Expect some elevated HR and sharp accelerations. Be prepared to leave it all out there on the road!

​

**About ProRides**

Here’s your chance to experience what it’s like to ride in the biggest races in the world, thanks to SYSTM’s 4DP platform. We’ve taken the first-person camera footage and power data from a pro cyclist and analyzed it to determine which part of their 4DP® profile each of their efforts corresponds to. But since few of us can put down pro-level watts, we made it so all of the efforts are scaled to your own personal 4DP® profile. That means you get to experience exactly what the pros experience relative to your own abilities. When they sprint, you sprint. When they attack, you attack. When they sit up, you get to take it (relatively) easy. It's the most immersive, realistic race simulation out there.
